source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dramatic, wide-angle view of a powerful storm over a vast, flat grassland. The sky is dominated by dark, turbulent clouds with striking shades of teal and gray, while hints of light touch their upper edges. In the distance, a curtain of heavy rain falls onto the plains. The scene captures the slow, powerful movement of the storm system.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a dramatic, wide-angle view of a powerful storm over a vast, flat grassland. The sky is dominated by dark, turbulent clouds with striking shades of teal and gray, while hints of light touch their upper edges. In the distance, a curtain of heavy rain falls onto the plains. The scene captures the slow, powerful movement of the storm system.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a herd of wild horses gallops across the grassland in the foreground, which is not visible in the video.

The sky is dominated by dark, turbulent clouds with striking shades of teal and gray, while hints of light touch their upper edges. In the distance, a curtain of heavy rain falls onto the plains.
